column5: I need to change the Hull # on my boat. Anyone knows where I can get in done cheap in the GTA.  thanks!

If you want individual number stickers just go get some at Crappy tire or walmart. If you want a nice one piece, I had one done at a place on Nugget Drive in Scarborough. It was done very well and for a decent price.
Any vinyl graphics shop. I ordered my steel boat set, and boat name, from here and had them in a week.  http://www.decalcity.com/
